These emojis appear in the **card titles** to quickly communicate language characteristics at a glance.

subject: Programming Language
title: JavaScript ğŸŒŠ ğŸ§  ğŸŒ
description:
JavaScript is a dynamically typed, garbage-collected language built around an **event-driven, single-threaded execution model**.

## Runtime Model
- Browser engines (V8, SpiderMonkey)
- Node.js, Deno, Bun
- Async I/O via event loop

## Major Libraries and Tooling
- **Frontend**: React, Vue, Svelte
- **Meta-frameworks**: Next.js, Nuxt
- **Backend**: Express, Fastify, Hono
- **Build/Tooling**: Vite, Webpack, ESLint, Jest

subject: Programming Language
title: Python ğŸŒŠ ğŸ§
description:
Python is a dynamically typed, interpreted language optimized for **readability, rapid iteration, and glue code**.

## Execution Model
- CPython interpreter

## Major Libraries and Tooling
- **Data/ML**: NumPy, Pandas, PyTorch, TensorFlow
- **Vision**: OpenCV, Tesseract
- **Web**: FastAPI, Flask, Django

## Personal Usage
- Used in **ocr-image-to-excalidraw** for OCR pipelines

subject: Programming Language
title: Java ğŸ§± ğŸ§  ğŸ¤–
description:
Java is a statically typed, JVM-based language emphasizing **portability, strong tooling, and long-lived systems**.

## Runtime Model
- JVM with JIT compilation
- Garbage-collected memory
- Strong backward compatibility

## Major Libraries and Tooling
- **Enterprise**: Spring Boot, Hibernate
- **Build**: Maven, Gradle
- **Testing**: JUnit, Mockito
- **Robotics**: WPILib (FIRST Robotics)

subject: Programming Language
title: C++ ğŸ§± âš™ï¸ ğŸš€
description:
C++ is a statically typed, compiled systems language offering **explicit control over memory and performance**.

## Execution Model
- Ahead-of-time compilation
- RAII-based memory management
- Zero-cost abstractions

## Major Libraries and Tooling
- **Core**: STL, Boost
- **Build**: CMake, Meson
- **Engines**: Unreal Engine
- **Vision**: OpenCV

subject: Programming Language
title: TypeScript ğŸ§± ğŸ§  ğŸŒ
description:
TypeScript adds a **structural static type system** on top of JavaScript.

## Type System
- Compile-time only
- Structural typing

## Major Libraries and Tooling
- **Frontend**: React, Angular
- **Backend**: NestJS, tRPC
- **Schema/Types**: Zod, Prisma

## Strengths
- Safer refactors
- Excellent editor tooling
- Scales well for large apps

subject: Programming Language
title: HTML ğŸ“„ ğŸŒ
description:
HTML is a declarative markup language defining **document structure and semantics** on the web.

## Core Concepts
- Semantic elements
- Accessibility (ARIA)
- DOM integration

## Ecosystem
- HTML5 APIs like Canvas
- Web Components
- SEO tooling

subject: Programming Language
title: CSS ğŸ¨ ğŸŒ
description:
CSS defines **layout, visual presentation, and responsive behavior** of web documents.

## Modern Capabilities
- Flexbox and Grid
- Animations and transitions
- Container queries

## Ecosystem
- Tailwind CSS
- Sass, PostCSS
- CSS Modules

subject: Programming Language
title: Ruby ğŸŒŠ ğŸ§
description:
Ruby is a dynamically typed language optimized for **developer productivity and expressiveness**.

## Runtime Model
- Interpreted with GC
- Highly reflective

## Major Libraries and Tooling
- Ruby on Rails
- Bundler
- RSpec, Sidekiq

## Strengths
- Rapid application development
- Convention over configuration
